subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
Roads and Traffic
lead_paragraph: In the heart of a city known for its concrete skyline and perpetually choked roads, there is, at least once a week, a slice of relief in a 2.2-mile stretch of pavement known locally as the Minhocão.
